title: September Jobs Report: Has the Rot Already Set In?
text:
It could have been worse, but it wasn't goodThat's my basic take on the September employment reportJudging the numbers vsexpectations, they were decentHowever, taken in the bigger picture, the economy is almost certainly slowing, and the odds of a recession in 2020 have gone up substantially

description: While I understand the market's immediate reaction to the September jobs report, in the grander scheme, this is a bad report.
authors: Has The Rot Already Set In
